segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, drying dishes with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so calm and focused, but there's water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the sink is overflowing, and the water is just pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating quite a mess, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids behind her are being so mischievous, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching up high, and it looks like he's about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit tense watching this, I hope he doesn't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a tense scene to witness, I hope everything turns out okay.
segments.speaker: PAR
